processor_info: Intel Core i3-2310M processor (dual-core, 2.10GHz, 3MB cache), Intel Core i7-2630QM processor (quad-core, 2.00 GHz, 6MB cache), Intel Core i5-2410M processor (dual-core, 2.30GHz, 3MB cache), Intel Turbo Boost 2.0 (2.90GHz), HT technology
additional_features: 14.0" HD (WXGA 1366x768) TFT color, VibrantView (glossy), LED backlight
NVIDIA GeForce GT 525M (for models with NVIDIA Optimus technology)
Two-button touch pad with scroll feature, multi-touch
6-in-1 reader (MMC, MS, MS PRO, SD, SDHC, xD)
Stereo speakers (1.5 watt x 2), internal microphone, microphone input jack (3.5 mm), headphone jack (3.5 mm)
